channel.title: pools | ArQmA
channel.description: Decentralized public blockchain open source project

item.title: What is ArQmA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: ArQmA is a privacy coin, born out of frustration with other projects. The founders are a collection of miners that were tired of ASIC takeovers, 51% attacks, poorly managed communities, and all the other problems that make mining difficult.
item.content:encoded: ArQmA is a privacy coin, born out of frustration with other projects. The founders are a collection of miners that were tired of ASIC takeovers, 51% attacks, poorly managed communities, and all the other problems that make mining difficult.
